data.actual_result: Clip closes and you return to a messed up Discord client
data.expected_result: You should be able to watch the clip (such as a YT embed) or it should close
data.short_description: If watching a Twitch clip fullscreen and the link is deleted it messes up the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Get someone/yourself to post a link to a Twitch clip - Open in embed and go fullscreen - Get someone else to delete it - Observe
